data.title: Pierce Berke's Post - LinkedIn
data.snippet:

# Pierce Berke’s Post

View profile for Pierce Berke

I am humbled to announce my acceptance into the inaugural cohort of the Mammoth Leadership Academy for Spring 2025. I can't wait to grow as a leader and listener over the course of the 6-week program, and it was a pleasure speaking with President Michael Elliott at the Welcome Dinner last night!

Great news Pierce!

Congrats Mr. Berke .

Matas Buitkus, graphic [...] Congrats Mr. Berke .

Matas Buitkus, graphic

Congratulations Pierce! I know this program will inspire growth in you as a future leader! Good luck and I hope it all goes well!

data.title: Pierce, Schmidt break school records as Amherst competes at ...
data.snippet:
### Story Links

   Results

BOSTON --Junior Cody Pierce and first-year Gavin Schmidt each broke program records as the Amherst College men's track and field team competed at Middlebury's Small College Invitational hosted at the TRACK at new balance on Sunday.

 Pierce established a new record in the 200m while Schmidt broke the school record in the shot put.

 Amherst will resume competition on Friday, February 7 at 3 p.m. and Saturday, February 8 at 10 a.m. the Tufts Cupid Challenge.

MEET HIGHLIGHTS: [...] Women's Sports
       BasketballScheduleRosterNewsFacebookTwitterInstagramTickets
       Cross CountryScheduleRosterNewsFacebookTwitterInstagramTickets
       Field HockeyScheduleRosterNewsFacebookTwitterInstagramTickets
       GolfScheduleRosterNewsFacebookTwitterInstagramTickets
       Ice HockeyScheduleRosterNewsFacebookTwitterInstagramTickets
       LacrosseScheduleRosterNewsFacebookTwitterInstagramTickets
       SoccerScheduleRosterNewsFacebookTwitterInstagramTickets
       SoftballScheduleRosterNewsFacebookTwitterInstagramTickets
       SquashScheduleRosterNewsFacebookTwitterInstagramTickets
       Swimming & DivingScheduleRosterNewsFacebookTwitterInstagramTickets
       TennisScheduleRosterNewsFacebookTwitterInstagramTickets [...] MEET HIGHLIGHTS:

  Competing in the fastest of 15 heats, Pierce set a new Amherst school record in the 200m registering a time of 21.75 to finish second overall with a time that ranks among the top 15 in Division III this season. Pierce broke the record of 21.93 set by Henry Buren '22 that was set in 2020.

  Schmidt broke a 42-year old Amherst program record in the shot put, throwing a mark of 15.27m to break the record of 15.09m set by Dana King '83 in 1983 and finish second in the event.

  Junior Ben Davis won the 800m by almost four seconds, crossing the line with a winning time and personal record of 1:51.49 that currently ranks third in Division III this season.
